pull.title: Improve proxy initialization (continues #4871)
pull.body:
Make the proxy initialization code in `AppInit2` more clear. This provides a straightforward flow, gets rid of .count() (which made it impossible to override an earlier provided proxy option to nothing), as well as comments the different cases.

This continues the work in #4871. Ping @diapolo.

events.body: This is a different, but better apporach than what I tried to do. Flow is straight forward, which I really like. I didn't yet test the code by myself, but from review this is (after fixing the nit) an utACK for now. I'm going to test this now.
